Developer Terms of Use
des:
With the JBMedia Smarthome skill you can control all devices connected to the Light-Manager Air. Experience the luxury of voice control of your entire home automation - without opening an app. Turn on the lights, dim the lamps, open and close the blinds, ask about the temperature, start playing music, change the room temperature or recall scenes. The possibilities are almost unlimited. Switches, lamps, blinds, loudspeakers, thermostats and sensors are supported. The JBMedia Light-Manager Air is required for use.

Installation
-------------

1. Activate the JBMedia Smarthome skill for Amazon Alexa.

2. Enter the associated email address in airStudio under Options> Light-Manager Setup> Cloud Services> Alexa Skill. Assign a user name under jbmedia Cloud.

3. Transfer the configuration. Your Light-Manager Air is now automatically connected to the Alexa voice control.
